name: cath
description: A powerful package that can interact with Cath API

scripts.node-update: npm i --save-dev node@16 && npm config set prefix=$(pwd)/node_modules/node && export PATH=$(pwd)/node_modules/node/bin:$PATH
scripts.node-clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm cache clear --force && npm cache clean --force && npm i
scripts.node-update-then-clean: npm run node-update && npm run node-clean-cache
scripts.canvas: npm uninstall canvas && npm i canvas
scripts.all: npm run node-update && npm run node-clean && npm uninstall canvas && npm i canvas && node .

author: Åƒ1ght#0001
